history.proof: intros H. hauto l: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: The reference prop_lim_def was not found in the current environment.
Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 2 patterns.

original: intros H. rewrite prop_lim_def in H. destruct s as [|x s Hs]. - inversion H. - specialize (H x). unfold propLim in H. rewrite Hs in H. auto.
